summary: Travel Cost Overhaul: [color=yellow][b]Adds variable cart travel cost[/color][/b]; and modifies the prices of Horse Prices and a Night at the Inn. Multiple choice upon entering game.
descriptionHtml:
[img=center]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/8499-1-1329150935.png[/img]

[center][font=\"Segoe UI\"][i][b]v1.4 by TriggerSpasm[/b][/i]

27th February 2012

[color=red][u][i][b]LATEST UPDATE:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
This is to fix the issue of not being able to save after uninstall of this mod.
You can save fine if: You uninstall the mod but leave the NewCarriageSystem.pex file in the Data\\Scritps folder. At the moment I\'m not sure why, possibly the way I wrote the script the game might need to know its there afterward. 

So if you have the 1.4 version, remove the mod, then extract \"NewCarriageSystem.pex\" (from inside the Scripts folder in the archive) to the Data\\Scripts folder. This should allow you to save fine.

I will test this on my PC more to see if after time you can delete the file, (for tidyness) as the game may no longer need it after a while. Check/Leave comments for any updates.
Sorry for the inconvenience!

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Description:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
[color=green][b]Completely working Carriages[/color][/b]
Carriage system now completely working, had to add a line or two of dialogue to retrieve the destination and set the new price based on the location but it\'s worth it!

Coming Soon: Variable Inn costs along with Better Inn furnishings, dependant on class.

Also does this as before:
Nights at the Inn - Choose one of 5 settings from Vanilla - 200 per night. 
Price of a Horse - Choose one of 6 settings from Vanilla - 4000 per horse.

[i][color=red]Installation[/color][/i]

It\'s best to download the Nexus Mod Manager and use that.

Manual:
Simply place the .esp and two folders into your Skyrim\\Data folder.
Run game and select which prices you like best!

[i][color=red]Uninstallation[/color][/i]

Deacactivate with the mod manager.

Manual:
Remove the .esp from the Data folder, and remove the .pex files in this archive from the Data\\Scripts folder
Delete the \"TCO - Travel Cost Overhaul.esp\" folder from Data\\Sound\\Voice.

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Version 1.4:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
-Fix for issue with saving after uninstalling this mod.

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Version 1.3:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
-Made variable cart travel better, a lot better.

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Version 1.2:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
-Made Cart Travel costs variable between towns.

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Version 1.1:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
-Changed small town prices to, Vanilla-100-200-300-400-500-600
-Added 600 as another option on large towns, Vanilla-100-200-300-400-500-600
-You can now set the small towns higher if you like.[/center]

[color=yellow][u][i][b]Credits:[/b][/i][/u][/color]
 Credits to me for making the mod.
 Big thanks to Bethesda for the Game and Creation Kit.[/font]
author: TriggerSpasm
